name: P R I S M A / /
description: After several lifetimes you awaken to the sound of a ringing bell echoing off  someplace in the mist. Before you are thousands of stone steps, ascending to a mountainous summit. Disoriented, you slowly begin the ascension.  As you near the top you are greeted with a comforting, cool breeze and a familiar ringing of a bell tolling. You press on, reaching the top and taking in the vision.  In the far distance stands a monumental vista, a marvel of color to behold. Rays of refracted beauty gleam brightly as the stars shine through the massive Prismatic Stone.  You can feel an inexplicable desire to contact the Stone. Almost as if it was calling your name. You gather your breath, your clarity, and you take the final steps towards your journey’s end. . .
